pr_title: Fix crash on redirect if no activity available

timeline.message: Return a null response intent if no activity available

timeline.bodyText: Shahazib - Would you mind adding a comment here about the result of the authorization request will be.  I'm assuming the only this can happen is if the user closes the app or if the OS closes the app due to memory pressure.  I guess I want to know returning null here results in.  I'm assuming no callback at all... since we no longer have something to call back to.
timeline.author: shoatman

replies.bodyText:
Yeah this would happen if the app got closed either by user or OS. This method is called in BrowserTabActivity. See this PR: https://github.com/AzureAD/microsoft-authentication-library-for-android/pull/966/files
I catch the null, log a warning, show a toast, and finish
There won't be any result, no tokens etc. as there is no callback and no interactive request in memory
replies.author: shahzaibj
